LanguageData.VGE_EngineeringConsole.label: engineering console
LanguageData.VGE_EngineeringConsole.description: An interface used to monitor the maintenance status of all gravship components. It draws power directly from the grav engine.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay impact:</color> Reduces maintenance sensitivity of all gravship structures on this gravship by 0.5.
